channel.title: Behind The Wall
channel.description: Recent content on Behind The Wall

item.title: Behind The Wall Unisex T-Shirt
item.description: Featuring a large Behind The Wall logo design across the back and a smaller logo on the front. Made from 100% organic combed cotton and manufactured solely using renewable green energy from wind and solar power.

item.title: Hardwood Edges [15]
item.description: Made from Beech hardwood, our wooden edges are more environmentally friendly than resin alternatives. Unique edges to spice up your training board during winter, these edges are just over 2.

item.title: Hardwood Triangle Crimp Set
item.description: Made from Beech hardwood, our triangle crimp set are more environmentally friendly than resin alternatives. 125mm long for more variation in grip, with one three flat edges.
